Comments.Message:
Can you explain more what you think should be the correct behavior ?

Unfortunately, this don't apply when you are navigating in the new empty row while filling the cells with data, what happen is that when you press the Tab key while you are in the last cell in the new row, you navigate to a different control in the window!! really strange
The normal action is a new empty row will be created and the the first cell in the newest row is selected.

I have the same issue,when you create new row and navigate to the last,by pressing tab key,new row appears.but if i delete the current row ,selection moves to previous row and new empty row never comes in any way.

when in last column, either tab OR enter should add a new row
